summary: This is a transcript of a videotaped deposition taken on December 4, 2009, in West Palm Beach, Florida, as part of civil litigation against Jeffrey Epstein. The witness, a female plaintiff, is being questioned by defense attorney Mark T. Lutier about her sexual encounters with Epstein, the involvement of other women, and specific incidents including nude photography. This document is a deposition transcript where a female witness describes her experiences as an underage girl providing massages for Jeffrey Epstein. She details the sexual nature of the massages, her recruitment of other girls (including her best friend), the payments involved, and the psychological impact on her. She also discusses her relationship with a man named 'Mr. [REDACTED]' and interactions between him and Epstein. This is a deposition transcript from a civil case against Jeffrey Epstein, taken on December 4, 2009. The witness, identified as 'M.', describes being recruited by Epstein, engaging in sexual acts with him for money, and recruiting another minor, also identified as 'M.', for similar encounters. The testimony includes details of drug use, payment, and the psychological impact on the witness.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the deposition. The witness describes providing massages for him, which involved sexual acts, and being paid. She also states she recruited other girls for him.

persons.name: Mark T. Lutier
persons.context: Attorney representing Jeffrey Epstein, conducting the deposition and questioning the witness about her allegations and relationships.

persons.name: Robert D. Critton, Jr.
persons.context: Attorney also listed as representing Jeffrey Epstein, present at the deposition.

persons.name: Cynthia Hopkins
persons.context: The certified court reporter and notary public who transcribed the deposition and certified the transcript.

persons.name: Stan Sanders
persons.context: Videographer from Visual Evidence, Incorporated, recording the deposition.

persons.name: Mr. Lutier
persons.context: The attorney questioning the witness, likely representing Jeffrey Epstein or a related party.

persons.name: Mr. [REDACTED]
persons.role: Witness's Partner / Father of her child
persons.context: Referred to as 'Mr. [ ]' in the text. He was the witness's partner, father of her child, and sometimes drove her to Epstein's house. He later met with Epstein's lawyers and was incarcerated with Epstein.

connections.description: The witness describes performing massages for Epstein while nude, during which he would masturbate, and recounts a specific incident where another woman performed oral sex on her while Epstein was present.
The witness mentions a friend (first name only, last name unknown) who also brought claims against Epstein, but they have not spoken since the incident.
The witness testifies about bringing a female friend to Epstein's house on multiple occasions and receiving an extra $100 from Epstein for doing so, which she split with the friend.
The witness had a boyfriend since age 13 who sometimes drove her and other girls to Epstein's house. She had a prior sexual relationship with him.
Epstein paid the witness an extra $100 for bringing another female to his house, according to the witness's testimony.
The witness, as an underage girl, provided massages for Epstein that involved him masturbating. She was paid and describes psychological trauma as a result.
The witness recruited her best friend M. to go to Epstein's house for massages, splitting the payment with her.
The witness brought S. to Epstein's house three or four times and was paid, giving S. a portion.
They were in a relationship, had a child together, and he sometimes drove her to Epstein's house. She kept secrets about Epstein from him.
They met while the witness was still visiting Epstein. Later, they were incarcerated together. Epstein's lawyers allegedly tried to hire Mr. [REDACTED].
The witness describes being recruited by Epstein as a minor, engaging in sexual acts (nude massage, nipple play while he masturbated) for payment.
The witness recruited the other minor 'M.' to go to Epstein's home, told her what to expect, and was paid an extra $100 for bringing her.

events.title: Deposition of Plaintiff
events.description: Videotaped deposition of a plaintiff in a civil case against Jeffrey Epstein, conducted in West Palm Beach, Florida.

events.title: Filing of Civil Cases
events.description: Multiple related civil cases (08-CIV-80119 et al.) were filed against Jeffrey Epstein in the Southern District of Florida.

events.title: Nude Photography Session
events.description: The witness was photographed in the nude at Epstein's house, by the pool, and off the dock by a female associate using professional digital cameras, for which she was paid $500.

events.title: Sexual Encounter with Third Party
events.description: The witness describes an incident at Epstein's house where an unidentified nude woman performed oral sex on her for 15-20 minutes while Epstein was having sex with that woman behind her.

events.title: Witness's First Recruitment of M.
events.description: The witness told her best friend M. about Epstein, saying they would give him a massage and he might ask her to be topless, but withheld the full sexual nature of her own experiences.

events.title: Epstein's Lawyers Attempt to Hire Mr. [REDACTED]
events.description: Mr. [REDACTED] told the witness that lawyers defending Jeffrey Epstein tried to hire him the previous year (2008).

events.title: Witness and Mr. [REDACTED] Leave Florida
events.description: The witness and Mr. [REDACTED] left Florida together in July when she was 16, which is when she stopped going to Epstein's.

events.title: Mr. [REDACTED] Attempts to Drown Witness
events.description: The witness states that Mr. [REDACTED] was physically violent, including an incident where he tried to drown her in a canal before she stopped going to Epstein's.

events.title: Deposition of Witness M.
events.description: The sworn deposition of a witness, identified as 'M.', in a civil case against Jeffrey Epstein. The witness provides detailed testimony about sexual encounters with Epstein, recruiting another minor, and associated drug use.

events.title: First Encounter with Second Minor M.
events.description: The witness describes taking the second minor 'M.' to Epstein's home for the first time. Both were naked, gave Epstein a massage, played with his nipples, and he masturbated. The witness was paid $400.

events.title: Second Encounter with Second Minor M.
events.description: The witness took the second minor 'M.' to Epstein's home a second time. The witness was asked to leave the room while 'M.' and Epstein joked and laughed about sexual activities 'M.' and her mother did for money.

events.title: Witness's First Cocaine Use
events.description: The witness states she first used cocaine during the time she met Jeffrey Epstein, implying a connection between her introduction to the drug and her involvement with him.

locations: Jeffrey Epstein's house (implied location in West Palm Beach area, near Intracoastal waterway)
Mr. Epstein's house (in Florida, near the Intracoastal)
Flagler Drive (location of Epstein's attorneys' office)
keyFacts: The witness alleges that during massages for Jeffrey Epstein, she was nude and he masturbated in front of her on every occasion.
The witness describes a specific sexual encounter at Epstein's house involving a third, unidentified woman performing oral sex on her while Epstein was present and engaged sexually with that woman.
The witness was paid $500 to pose for nude photographs at Epstein's house, taken by a female associate with professional digital cameras, purportedly for Epstein's 'personal enjoyment.'
The witness received an extra $100 from Epstein for bringing another female to his house and split that money with the friend she brought.
The deposition is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs, indicating confidentiality concerns.
The witness, while underage, was paid by Jeffrey Epstein for massages that involved sexual acts, including him masturbating.
The witness recruited at least two other girls (her best friend M. and another girl S.) to go to Epstein's house, splitting the payments with them.
The witness describes significant psychological trauma from her experiences with Epstein, including trust issues with older men, fear, and a degraded sense of self.
The witness's partner, Mr. [REDACTED], had contact with Epstein and Epstein's legal team, who allegedly tried to hire him while he was incarcerated with Epstein.
The witness kept the full extent of her experiences at Epstein's house a secret from both her recruited friend M. and her partner Mr. [REDACTED].
The witness, a minor at the time, was paid by Jeffrey Epstein for sexual acts which included nude massages and playing with his nipples while he masturbated.
The witness recruited another minor girl, identified as 'M.', for Epstein, was paid an extra $100 for bringing her, and was present during the initial sexual encounter.
The second minor 'M.' reportedly discussed with Epstein sexual activities she and her mother engaged in for money, leading the witness to feel uncomfortable and leave the room.
The witness directly links her first use of cocaine to the time period when she met Jeffrey Epstein.
The deposition was taken under a protective order, indicating the sensitive nature of the testimony.
